title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Haaram with South Sea Pearls
materials: 4.36 carats of Brilliant Cut Diamonds (SI Clarity
Lustrous). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Features a floral motif with interspersed diamond 'flowers'. Two Emeralds are beautifully placed within delicate filigree designs, culminating in a pendant adorned with South Sea pearls. The necklace showcases a contemporary take on traditional South Indian design with meticulous detailing and a flexible chain for comfortable wear.
colors: Creamy White (Pearls). A classic and elegant combination.
occasions: and upscale social gatherings. A statement piece suitable for both traditional Indian attire and modern evening wear. Ideal for Seemantham or any other special occassion.
description: This exquisite Haaram embodies timeless elegance with a modern twist. The brilliant diamonds sparkle beautifully, complementing the vibrant Emeralds and lustrous South Sea pearls. It's crafted with impeccable attention to detail and designed for lasting durability, making it a cherished heirloom for generations. Experience the blend of heritage and contemporary style with this statement piece.
